welcome.title: What to watch? üçø
welcome.subtitle: Stop endless scrolling! Tell me what you're in the mood for and get recommendations sorted by rating.
welcome.description: No more spending hours browsing streaming platforms without knowing what to choose. Mention actors, genres, time periods, moods... Our AI suggests the best recommendations, ranked by rating to help you decide quickly.
welcome.placeholder: Ex: A movie or TV show with Jennifer Aniston as the lead actress, late 90s
